sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import NewsCard from '../components/NewsCard'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import styles from '../styles/Games.module.scss'; const GamesPage = () => { // Define game categories const gameCategories = [ 'All Games', 'NBA 2K', 'WWE 2K', 'FC Mobile', 'FIFA', 'EA FC', 'Call of Duty', 'PUBG', 'Fortnite', 'Minecraft', 'League of Legends', 'Valorant' ]; // State for active category const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('All Games'); // Gaming news data with online images const gamingNews = [ { id: 1, image: 'https://cdn.nba.com/manage/2023/09/nba-2k24-kobe-1568x881.jpg', category: 'NBA 2K25', title: 'NBA 2K25 Contact Dunk: How To Activate and All Requirements', date: '27 May 2025', excerpt: 'Master the art of contact dunks in NBA 2K25 with our comprehensive guide on activation requirements and techniques.' }, { id: 2, image: 'https://cdn.wwe.com/f/styles/gallery_img_l/public/all/2022/05/2K22_LAUNCH_SCREENSHOT_15--7988f22e6bf47bb09ece1e5ae3b65eed.jpg', category: 'WWE 2K25', title: 'WWE 2K25 Best General Managers: Top Picks for MyGM Mode', date: '12 May 2025', excerpt: 'Discover the best general managers to choose in WWE 2K25 MyGM mode for ultimate success.' }, { id: 3, image: 'https://img.youtube.com/vi/4v7VlYwaMQ8/maxresdefault.jpg', category: 'FC Mobile', title: 'FC Mobile Aqua vs Inferno Players Released', date: '10 June 2025', excerpt: 'New player cards released in FC Mobile featuring the exciting Aqua vs Inferno event series.' }, { id: 4, image: 'https://assets.myket.ir/screenshots/xlarge/com.ea.gp.nbamobile/9387c517-9de4-4afa-8503-9bc56d324c58.png', category: 'NBA 2k Mobile', title: 'NBA 2K Mobile Codes: All New Update Redeem Codes List (May 2025)', date: '17 May 2025', excerpt: 'Get all the latest working redeem codes for NBA 2K Mobile to unlock exclusive rewards and bonuses.' }, { id: 5, image: 'https://cdn.wwe.com/f/styles/og_image/public/2021/03/wm-media-banner--c63c7538428f4596c31ef464c5f4a28a.png', category: 'WWE 2K25', title: 'WWE 2K25 WrestleMania Trailer Revealed: First Look at Epic Showcase Mode', date: '10 April 2025', excerpt: 'The official WrestleMania trailer for WWE 2K25 showcases the new epic showcase mode features.' }, { id: 6, image: 'https://cdn.realsport101.com/images/ncavvykf/realsport-production/a22d3dc41c0e38b0ab382013ecefd7d215649cb4-1920x1080.png', category: 'EAFC 25', title: 'FC 25 Shapeshifters Players Leaked: Find Out Which Players Were Revealed', date: '10 June 2025', excerpt: 'Exclusive leak reveals the upcoming Shapeshifters player cards coming to EA FC 25 Ultimate Team.' }, { id: 7, image: 'https://cdn.nba.com/manage/2020/09/nba-2k21-personalization-1-1568x882.jpg', category: 'NBA 2K25', title: 'NBA 2K25 Mods: Top 10 Mods You Should Try', date: '07 May 2025', excerpt: 'Enhance your NBA 2K25 experience with these amazing mods that transform gameplay and visuals.' }, { id: 8, image: 'https://www.dexerto.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=3840,quality=75,format=auto/https://editors.dexerto.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/12/wwe-2k23-header.jpg', category: 'WWE 2K25', title: 'WWE 2K25 How to Unlock All Wrestlers: Complete Guide to Unlocking Characters', date: '08 April 2025', excerpt: 'Complete walkthrough on how to unlock every wrestler and character in WWE 2K25.' }, { id: 9, image: 'https://a.espncdn.com/photo/2023/1024/r1247827_1296x729_16-9.jpg', category: 'FC Mobile', title: 'FC Mobile UCL RTTF Best XI Released: Find Out the List of All Players', date: '10 June 2025', excerpt: 'The complete list of UEFA Champions League Road to the Final Best XI players in FC Mobile.' }, { id: 10, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542751371-adc38448a05e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80', category: 'Valorant', title: 'Valorant Champions 2025: Everything You Need to Know', date: '15 June 2025', excerpt: 'Complete guide to Valorant Champions 2025 including teams, format, and schedule information.' }, { id: 11, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1511512578047-dfb367046420?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80', category: 'Call of Duty', title: 'Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III Season 4 Battle Pass Guide', date: '18 June 2025', excerpt: 'Everything you need to know about the new Season 4 Battle Pass in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III.' }, { id: 12, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1538481199705-c710c4e965fc?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80', category: 'Fortnite', title: 'Fortnite Chapter 5 Season 3: New Map Changes and Features', date: '20 June 2025', excerpt: 'Explore all the new map changes and exciting features in Fortnite Chapter 5 Season 3.' } ]; // Filter news based on active category const filteredNews = activeCategory === 'All Games' ? gamingNews : gamingNews.filter(item => item.category.toLowerCase().includes(activeCategory.toLowerCase()) ); // Featured games with comprehensive details const featuredGames = [ { id: 1, title: 'NBA 2K25', image: 'https://cdn.nba.com/manage/2023/07/NBA-2K24-KOAT-Edition-Box-Art-16-1568x882.jpg', rating: 4.5, metacritic: 85, platform: 'PS5, Xbox Series X, PC', price: '$69.99', genre: 'Sports', releaseDate: 'September 5, 2024', developer: '2K Games', publisher: 'Take-Two Interactive', description: 'The latest installment in the NBA 2K franchise featuring updated rosters, enhanced gameplay mechanics, and improved MyCareer mode.', storeLink: 'https://nba.2k.com/', userRating: 4.3, ageRating: 'E for Everyone' }, { id: 2, title: 'WWE 2K25', image: 'https://cdn.wwe.com/f/styles/og_image/public/2023/01/13---2k23-cover-athlete-16x9.jpg', rating: 4.2, metacritic: 82, platform: 'PS5, Xbox Series X, PC', price: '$59.99', genre: 'Sports', releaseDate: 'March 15, 2025', developer: 'Visual Concepts', publisher: '2K Sports', description: 'The premier WWE video game experience with authentic WWE Superstars, Legends, and Hall of Famers, along with stunning graphics and immersive gameplay.', storeLink: 'https://wwe.2k.com/', userRating: 4.0, ageRating: 'T for Teen' }, { id: 3, title: 'EA FC 25', image: 'https://cdn.realsport101.com/images/ncavvykf/realsport-production/0b9a99a01f34c760a99536903579a2fbc21bf732-1280x720.png', rating: 4.7, metacritic: 88, platform: 'PS5, Xbox Series X, PC, Switch', price: '$69.99', genre: 'Sports', releaseDate: 'September 27, 2024', developer: 'EA Sports', publisher: 'Electronic Arts', description: 'The next evolution of the world\'s most popular football game with HyperMotion technology, enhanced Career Mode, and Ultimate Team features.', storeLink: 'https://www.ea.com/games/ea-sports-fc', userRating: 4.5, ageRating: 'E for Everyone' }, { id: 4, title: 'Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III', image: 'https://www.callofduty.com/content/dam/atvi/callofduty/cod-touchui/mw3/meta/game-overview/mw3-game-overview-s6-meta-desktop.jpg', rating: 4.3, metacritic: 79, platform: 'PS5, Xbox Series X, PC', price: '$69.99', genre: 'FPS', releaseDate: 'November 10, 2023', developer: 'Infinity Ward', publisher: 'Activision', description: 'The sequel to 2022\'s blockbuster Modern Warfare II, featuring a gripping single-player campaign, multiplayer combat, and Special Ops tactical co-op.', storeLink: 'https://www.callofduty.com/', userRating: 4.1, ageRating: 'M for Mature' }, { id: 5, title: 'Valorant', image: 'https://images.contentstack.io/v3/assets/bltb6530b271fddd0b1/blt3f072336e3f3ade4/63096d7be4a8c30e088e7720/Valorant_2022_E5A2_PlayVALORANT_ContentStackThumbnail_1200x625_MB01.png', rating: 4.6, metacritic: 90, platform: 'PC', price: 'Free', genre: 'FPS', releaseDate: 'June 2, 2020', developer: 'Riot Games', publisher: 'Riot Games', description: 'A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities, featuring competitive matchmaking and regular updates.', storeLink: 'https://playvalorant.com/', userRating: 4.7, ageRating: 'T for Teen' }, { id: 6, title: 'Fortnite', image: 'https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-chapter-4-season-4-key-art-3840x2160-2e8161e8a65c.jpg', rating: 4.4, metacritic: 83, platform: 'Multi-platform', price: 'Free', genre: 'Battle Royale', releaseDate: 'July 25, 2017', developer: 'Epic Games', publisher: 'Epic Games', description: 'A free-to-play Battle Royale game with numerous game modes for every type of player, featuring constant updates with new seasons and content.', storeLink: 'https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/', userRating: 4.5, ageRating: 'T for Teen' } ]; return (

{/* Featured games carousel */}

{game.genre} {game.price}

{game.platform}
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
{game.rating}
))}

{activeCategory === 'All Games' ? 'Latest Gaming News' : `${activeCategory} News`}

{filteredNews.map(article => ( ))}

); }; export default GamesPage;
